title: Demolition - Radio Drama
description:
1 x 45 mins

The scandal of corrupt building practices on the Spanish coast is now well known, and has led to a handful of ex=pat's houses being demolished, even though they believed they had received all the appropriate consents. This is a scandal which does not appear to be going away.

In this fictional account, based on real events, a man finds that his home has been scheduled for demolition, having been built illegally. His daughter's boyfriend however, has murky connections which could help
